item.title: My First Post!
item.description: Now that you are reading this post, it means I finally created another blog and hosted it too ğŸ˜› Yay! ğŸ‰ My previous blogs that I hosted using Blogger during college - https://semlabs.blogspot.com/ https://semlectures.blogspot.com/ And now I have created this blog. I use these to create and host it: Hugo static site generator GitHub Pages Visual Studio Code Editor Markdown Emoji to put the awesome emojis in markdown ğŸ˜ Hoping to write tons of posts ğŸ˜‰ Stay tuned!
